about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.text: Because large commercial vehicles have large blind spots on each side, you should avoid driving beside them for long periods of time.

suggestedAnswer.text: Follow the large vehicle closely to reduce wind drag on your vehicle.

comment.text: Follow the large vehicle closely to reduce wind drag on your vehicle.

suggestedAnswer.text: Avoid driving beside it for long stretches of time.

hasPart.name: If you are involved in a traffic collision, you are required to complete and submit a written report to the DMV:

about.name: If you are involved in a traffic collision, you are required to complete and submit a written report to the DMV:

hasPart.assesses: If you are involved in a traffic collision, you are required to complete and submit a written report to the DMV: | If you are involved in a traffic collision, you are required to complete and submit a written report to the DMV: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If a collision results in death, any minor or major injury, or more than $1,000 in damage to anyone's property, each driver involved must file a report with the DMV within 10 days. In some cases, the driver's insurance agent, broker, or legal representative may file the report to represent the driver.

suggestedAnswer.text: Only if you or the other driver is injured.

comment.text: Only if you or the other driver is injured.

suggestedAnswer.text: If there is property damage in excess of $1,000 or if there are any injuries.

comment.text: If there is property damage in excess of $1,000 or if there are any injuries.

suggestedAnswer.text: Only if you are at fault.

comment.text: Only if you are at fault.

acceptedAnswer.text: If there is property damage in excess of $1,000 or if there are any injuries.

comment.text: If there is property damage in excess of $1,000 or if there are any injuries.

answerExplanation.text: If a collision results in death, any minor or major injury, or more than $1,000 in damage to anyone's property, each driver involved must file a report with the DMV within 10 days. In some cases, the driver's insurance agent, broker, or legal representative may file the report to represent the driver.

hasPart.name: Always stop before crossing railroad tracks when:

about.name: Always stop before crossing railroad tracks when:

hasPart.assesses: Always stop before crossing railroad tracks when: | Always stop before crossing railroad tracks when: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Expect a train on any track, at any time, traveling in either direction. If you need to stop after crossing the tracks, wait until you can completely cross the tracks before proceeding. Make sure your vehicle clears the tracks before you stop.

suggestedAnswer.text: There isn't room on the other side for you to completely cross the tracks.

comment.text: There isn't room on the other side for you to completely cross the tracks.

suggestedAnswer.text: The railroad crossing is located in a city or town that has frequent train traffic.

comment.text: The railroad crossing is located in a city or town that has frequent train traffic.

suggestedAnswer.text: You are transporting two or more young children in a passenger vehicle.

comment.text: You are transporting two or more young children in a passenger vehicle.

acceptedAnswer.text: There isn't room on the other side for you to completely cross the tracks.

comment.text: There isn't room on the other side for you to completely cross the tracks.

answerExplanation.text: Expect a train on any track, at any time, traveling in either direction. If you need to stop after crossing the tracks, wait until you can completely cross the tracks before proceeding. Make sure your vehicle clears the tracks before you stop.

If you need to stop after crossing the tracks, wait until you can completely cross the tracks before proceeding. Make sure your vehicle clears the tracks before you stop.

hasPart.name: When you see this yellow sign, you should:

about.name: When you see this yellow sign, you should:

hasPart.assesses: When you see this yellow sign, you should: | When you see this yellow sign, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A five-sided sign indicates that you are near a school. Be aware and stop if children are in the crosswalk.

comment.text: Always stop at the crosswalk.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stop at the crosswalk until a crossing guards signals for you to go.

comment.text: Stop at the crosswalk until a crossing guards signals for you to go.

suggestedAnswer.text: Be prepared to stop if children are in the crosswalk.

comment.text: Be prepared to stop if children are in the crosswalk.

acceptedAnswer.text: Be prepared to stop if children are in the crosswalk.

comment.text: Be prepared to stop if children are in the crosswalk.
